extendedInfo.description: As the governing body of tennis, the United States Tennis Association is proud to offer USTA.TV, an application for the Android phone and tablet that allows everyone to access public and private content posted on the USTAâs Dartfish TV channel for free.The channel features videos of the top professional players in action, broken down into key positions. A brand new library of HD and high speed videos is coming soon. Other featured content includes world renowned experts in their fields speaking on tennis specific topics such as strength and conditioning, mental toughness training, 10 & Under Tennis, and more.Players, parents and coaches affiliated with Regional Training Centers or USTAPD National Training Centers, will be assigned a login that will enable viewing of private content from their laptop/computer or from iOS/Android devices. Coaches attending future USTA High Performance Coaching Programs will be able to access their on-court presentations as well as highlights from the course presentations through the app.The USTA.tv app offers video scrubbing and accurate frame by frame playback both forward and backward for precise control over the video. The same key position technology that is on Dartfish TV is mirrored in the app allowing you to view the most important frames with drawing tools and a text description. Full screen playback is available in the landscape view to maximize your viewing experience.Get the USTA.tv app today and stay connected with the USTAâs Dartfish TV channel for the latest and greatest free tennis content from USTA Player Development.

reviews.title: Great potential
reviews.comment: This app has the potential to become a great app for tennis prospects. At the present time it is limited and will need to have much more content. The intention is great...just keep up the content and development.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Smooth app
reviews.comment: The pros make it look so easy. This helps me understand why so I can try to imitate them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great training techniques
reviews.comment: Good job USTA!!!   Now parents and coaches who don\'t think the using red, orange and green balls are \"real\" tennis should certainly see that the progressions make sense and that these kids are hitting \"real\" shots and playing on age appropriate courts with age appropriate equipment.  After all - they don\'t play T-ball on Yankee stadium with professional size equipment :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok at best
reviews.comment: You would think that since this is usta that the quality would be awesome but this is quiet disappointing just like their website. I can get better quality instruction on you tube with. And the guy doing it out of his garage on you tube seems to have a better grasp on how to use technology.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great site
reviews.comment: Love being able to track my teams
reviews.author: Taya Dianna
